name: Candy Light - New Sweet Glitte
description:
Candy Light - New Sweet Glitter is a very addictive match-three game! Game is a brand new and amazing casual game!
How to play:
- Match 3 or more identical cake blast
- Swipe three or more same cake blast to score points.
- Eliminate the more cake quickly can get extra scores.
- Over 200 well designed levels
